content:
I am a computer science graduate from the Sharif University of Technology, currently working as a Software Engineer at Sotoon - building a scalable, high-performance platform to transfer, store, and analyze big data in a Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) environment.
See my resum√© for more.

title: Mohammad Javad Shariati
